script.dialog: This Unit must interrupt your current dream sequence with important information.
This Unit will now explain the unique rules of a |C3|shiny battle.|C0|
|C3|Shiny battles|C0| are always fought against a monster that already loves you.
Because of that, your attacks will not reduce the |C3|fear|C0| of this monster.
Instead, your mere presence will drain the monster's |C3|fear|C0| over time.
Your attacks will fill the monster's |C3|love bar|C0| during a shiny battle.
When the |C3|love bar|C0| is full, the monster will attack you.
This Unit has sensed that you are wondering why you would want the monster to attack you?
That is because monsters will attack you with |C3|treasure bullets|C0| during a shiny battle.
|C3|Treasure bullets|C0| do not harm you and they also contain |C3|motes|C0| within them.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Extract these motes by colliding your heart into as many |C3|treasure bullets|C0| as possible.
The monster's |C3|fear|C0| will also stop draining for the duration of the attack.
This will extend the battle and give you more time to collect motes.
Once the monster's attack ends, the |C3|love bar|C0| will empty and her |C3|fear|C0| will resume draining.
The |C3|love bar|C0| will require more love to fill it after every subsequent attack.
One final thing to note is that |C3|shiny monsters|C0| will hold your combo the same as any |C3|shy monster|C0| would.
That is, your combo will only drop if a |C3|minion with motes inside|C0| escapes from the arena.
That is all the information on |C3|shiny battles|C0| that This Unit has for you.
This Unit wishes you good luck in this |C3|shiny battle.|C0|
